AcceptResourceShareInvitation.name: AcceptResourceShareInvitation
AcceptResourceShareInvitation.description: Accept the specified resource share invitation

AssociateResourceShare.name: AssociateResourceShare
AssociateResourceShare.description: Associates resource(s) and/or principal(s) to a resource share

AssociateResourceSharePermission.name: AssociateResourceSharePermission
AssociateResourceSharePermission.description: Associate a Permission with a Resource Share

CreateResourceShare.name: CreateResourceShare
CreateResourceShare.description: Create resource share with provided resource(s) and/or principal(s)
CreateResourceShare.conditionKeys:
aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   
                                                      aws:TagKeys
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   
                                                      ram:RequestedResourceType
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   
                                                      ram:ResourceArn
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   
                                                      ram:RequestedAllowsExternalPrincipals
                                                      
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   
                                                      ram:Principal

DisassociateResourceShare.name: DisassociateResourceShare
DisassociateResourceShare.description: Disassociates resource(s) and/or principal(s) from a resource share

DisassociateResourceSharePermission.name: DisassociateResourceSharePermission
DisassociateResourceSharePermission.description: Disassociate a Permission from a Resource Share

EnableSharingWithAwsOrganization.name: EnableSharingWithAwsOrganization
EnableSharingWithAwsOrganization.description:
Grants permission to access customer's organization and create a SLR in the customer's
                                                account

GetPermission.name: GetPermission
GetPermission.description: Gets the contents of an AWS RAM permission

GetResourcePolicies.name: GetResourcePolicies
GetResourcePolicies.description: Gets the policies for the specified resources that you own and have shared

GetResourceShareAssociations.name: GetResourceShareAssociations
GetResourceShareAssociations.description:
Get a set of resource share associations from a provided list or with a specified
                                                status of the specified type

GetResourceShareInvitations.name: GetResourceShareInvitations
GetResourceShareInvitations.description:
Get resource share invitations by the specified invitation arn or those for the resource
                                                share

GetResourceShares.name: GetResourceShares
GetResourceShares.description: Get a set of resource shares from a provided list or with a specified status

ListPendingInvitationResources.name: ListPendingInvitationResources
ListPendingInvitationResources.description:
Lists the resources in a resource share that is shared with you but that the invitation
                                                is still pending for

ListPrincipals.name: ListPrincipals
ListPrincipals.description:
Lists the principals that you have shared resources with or that have shared resources
                                                with you

ListResourceSharePermissions.name: ListResourceSharePermissions
ListResourceSharePermissions.description: List the Permissions associated with a Resource Share

ListResourceTypes.name: ListResourceTypes
ListResourceTypes.description: Lists the shareable resource types supported by AWS RAM

ListResources.name: ListResources
ListResources.description:
Lists the resources that you added to a resource shares or the resources that are
                                                shared with you

PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.name: PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy
PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.description: Use this API action to promote the resource share

RejectResourceShareInvitation.name: RejectResourceShareInvitation
RejectResourceShareInvitation.description: Reject the specified resource share invitation

UpdateResourceShare.name: UpdateResourceShare
UpdateResourceShare.description: Update attributes of the resource share
